TopicTitle: Anyone know how I can acquire really old versions? (0.14 - 0.18)

Articles.Content:
I've got all the pre 0.14 versions and all the post 0.18 versions, so I need to collect 0.14.X, 0.15.X, 0.16.X, 0.17.X, and 0.18.X.

I understand that it's illegal to share it, but I own the game and would love to experience the old versions. If the fact that I've made a mod isn't enough proof that I own KSP, then check my reddit account, /u/TriggeredSnake. If the number of KSP posts I've made on reddit also isn't enough proof, then I can link you to me Steam account.

Problem is that is illegal to provide you with a copy, even by you being able to legally own such copy.

It's the reason the name of the thing is "copy - right". The right to produce copies.

Unless Squad agrees in providing you with them (if yes, I want too!), or the Store you use have them, there's no Law "safe" way to answer your question, so there's no way to answer it without breaking Forum rules.

Sorry. I want them too.

Some content has been removed.

Folks, just a reminder that illegal copying of the game is illegal. Please do not offer to provide other people with copies of the game, or solicit them to do the same.

Thank you for your understanding.
